sense.gloss: over-optimistic calculation, counting one's chickens before they're hatched

sdata.j: ↑捕↑↓と↓らぬ↑狸↑↓たぬき↓の|↑皮算用|↑↓かわざんよう↓。
↑取↑↓と↓らぬ↑狸↑↓たぬき↓の|↑皮算用|↑↓かわざんよう↓か。
sdata.e: Are you counting your chickens before they are hatched?

sdata.j: ↑捕↑↓と↓らぬ↑狸↑↓たぬき↓の|↑皮算用|↑↓かわざんよう↓をするな。
sdata.e: Don't count your chickens before they are hatched.

sdata.j: ↑捕↑↓と↓らぬ↑狸↑↓たぬき↓の|↑皮算用|↑↓かわざんよう↓をするな。
sdata.e: Don't count your chickens before they're hatched.

sdata.j: ↑取↑↓と↓らぬ↑狸↑↓たぬき↓の|↑皮算用|↑↓かわざんよう↓。
sdata.e: Don't count your chickens before they're hatched.
